Destiny Church highway convoy: Police furious at Brian Tamaki-organised group’s ‘reckless, unlawful, irresponsible’ conduct https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/destiny-church-highway-convoy-police-furious-at-brian-tamaki-organized-groups-reckless-unlawful-irresponsible-conduct/RIAUARLAAJGXJJY4WXKHPUXQ3Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/destiny-church-highway-convoy-police-furious-at-brian-tamaki-organized-groups-reckless-unlawful-irresponsible-conduct/RIAUARLAAJGXJJY4WXKHPUXQ3Y/ Cherie Howie, Vaimoana MasePolice say thousands of people were affected by today's convoy. Sat, 16 Nov 2024 04:53:48 +0000 A convoy organised by Destiny Church leader Brian Tamaki to protest the flying of flags other than New Zealand's official ensign stopped traffic on State Highway 1 near Bombay to perform a haka.
Wellington crash: Motorists facing ‘significant delays’ after accident on SH2 near Ngauranga Gorge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-crash-motorists-faceing-significant-delays-after-accident-on-sh2-near-ngauranga-gorge/BO4XFWYZU5FG7DWOD776NKUWKE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-crash-motorists-faceing-significant-delays-after-accident-on-sh2-near-ngauranga-gorge/BO4XFWYZU5FG7DWOD776NKUWKE/ 'Indications are there have been serious injuries': Police. Sat, 16 Nov 2024 04:44:49 +0000 Wellington motorists are facing significant delays after a crash on State Highway 2 near Ngauranga Gorge. Image / NZTA
Treaty Principles Bill: Lorde throws support behind Hana-Rawhiti Maipi-Clarke and MPs’ haka in Parliament https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/treaty-principles-bill-lorde-throws-support-behind-hana-rawhiti-maipi-clarke-and-mps-haka-in-parliament/JZNF5GSMGBCWTCTUZ4PDDSHQMQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/treaty-principles-bill-lorde-throws-support-behind-hana-rawhiti-maipi-clarke-and-mps-haka-in-parliament/JZNF5GSMGBCWTCTUZ4PDDSHQMQ/ Star singer lends her voice to back Te Pāti Māori MPs' protest.Sat, 16 Nov 2024 04:38:31 +0000 Ella Yelich-O'Connor, better known as Lorde, has thrown her support behind a haka that erupted in Parliament on Thursday.
